Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.11.2014 GB SCR19328 Removed MQ1/268 when no DCLV-rows are present
02.09.2013 SH SCR18393 Added test on DEBB_DATLASTPOSVERIFPHONE = null
09.08.2013 SH SCR18337 Introduced DEBB_DATLASTPOSVERIFPHONE (used to obtain DEBB)
20.06.2013 GB SCR18209 Extended the test Selection of debtors to verify
29.01.2013 SH SCR17914 Task Calc sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTC): Removed test on DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER = null or
DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER < (GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE - 180)
09.05.2012 GB SCR17325 Extended list of parameter if BSP018 is calls
18.09.2011 GB SCR 16754 Removed the range condition DEBH_CLNT_CLNTNO = 0
(task SelectionOfInvoices)
-- INFO: If the selection of SCHT has to be changed, also task
"Calc sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTC)" need to be changed where the same SCHT test are
-- Remove MQ1 when no DCLV-rows are present
-- Remove MQ268 when no DCLV-rows are present
-- Reset variables
-- Check debtors to verify
(Most of the tests are implemented in SQL where box and performed on database
level to speed up the progam)
-- Debtor is selected for verification
-- Only if debtor is selected for verification, see GroupPrefix SCHI_DEBC_NO

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select count(*), cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SCHI, :1/SCHT where SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV = ':2' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and SCHT_ADDTOSALES = 'Y' and SCHT_SCHEDULETYPE <> 2 and SCHI_SCHT_NO = SCHT_NO and SCHI_DEBC_NO = :3 and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' for fetch only
